Name.potential_issues: Leading or trailing spaces; inconsistent capitalization

Gender.possible_meaning: Represents the gender of an individual
Gender.potential_issues: Non-binary values, inconsistent casing, or null entries

Age.potential_issues: Non-integer values, missing values, or negative numbers

City.possible_meaning: List of cities within a country

Department.potential_issues: Leading or trailing spaces, inconsistent casing of department names

Salary.potential_issues: Variability in salary ranges, missing values or negative numbers

Email.potential_issues: Invalid email format, missing domain, or use of non-standard characters
